bio: I am a Blockchain Data Analyst and have been covering various chains and projects since 2021, including Optimism.
contributionDescription:
Over the past years i have created numerous Dune Dashboards (which are listed below) regarding the Optimism Ecosystem, including a chain overview (transactions, TVL, projects), governance statistics (delegates data), after bridge overview (what do users do after bridgeging), data about the $OP token (holders, price, airdrops), but also study's on Airdrop effect and Coinbase Quests. I also covered serveral projects that currently have prescence on OP like Velodrome and Polynomial. These dashboards have been referenced on serveral places.

Besides creating new dashboards, existing ones continuously need updates. Reasons are for example: 1) Adding new metrics to dashboards, 2) Contracts/dapps get updated, 3) Dune has migrated to a new query language therefore all querys needed rewriting.

contributionLinks.description: Dune Dashboard: Optimism x Coinbase Quests

impactDescription:
These dashboards have gained quite some popularity on Dune in het past years. In total the dashboards created for the Optimism Ecosystem have gained 587 stars (which are basically equal to "likes"), indicating the amount of users that saved the dashboard and have likely came back to it later on. 

Also these dashboards have been referenced in various places; blogs, news articles, projects websites and forums. Creating more exposure to the OP Stack and introducing potentially new users and developers. 

Example sources: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1GZOqlDReL5kOiFz1iguav7mg5seQp5IvuRVyQ2oJg5o/edit?usp=sharing
